# Installation Guide
## How to install

Python Gazetteer is available in [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/python-gazetteer/) and could be installed via
```bash
pip install python-gazetteer
```
Or one could visit the release page from [here](https://github.com/SOORAJTS2001/gazetteer/releases) and download the source code<br>

This package is compatible with Python versions of `3.12` `3.13` and `3.14` and depends on the
following packages
```md
pydantic
scipy
shapely
```
